ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Incurred Cost
RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the specified type of restructuring cost.

LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.label: Loss Contingency, New Claims Filed, Number
LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.description: The total number of new claims filed pertaining to a loss contingency during the period.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLandHeldForUse.label: Proceeds from Sale of Land Held-for-use
ProceedsFromSaleOfLandHeldForUse.description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for use; excludes sales of land held as inventory or investments.

RestructuringReserveCurrent.label: Restructuring Reserve, Current
RestructuringReserveCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of known and estimated obligations associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a duly authorized plan, which are expected to be paid in the next twelve months or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.
